text: 1.14: Mt 13.55; Ru 23.49; 23.55; 24.10; Zo 6.42; 7.5Mbe kha gumgi, mbe wari tɨgap ndava bavira kav, mbe wari tɨgap Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav wari ki. Mbe mbigi mbari, mbe vhɨra mbe phorga ki. Mba mbigi Zisasan niamuuŋ Maria gum, ana ŋgugi, mbe vhɨra zav, maam mbe phorgav mbe wari tɨgap, Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuai.
